hooks.prompt:
Generate an end-of-session changelog. Read the transcript at the provided transcript_path to understand what was done this session.

Create a file named 'changelog_<YYYY-MM-DD_HH-MM-SS>.txt' in the project root directory ($CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR) containing:

1. Date and time
2. Branch(es) worked on (check git if needed)
3. Summary of changes made
4. Files modified/created
5. Any commits made
6. Notes or follow-up items for next session

Keep it concise but informative.

Hook input: $ARGUMENTS
